channel.title: [PI] how to add working method OpenUpBank()?
channel.description: i'm currently working on a project. and bank booths wont even open up the bank interface. iv added click1 and click2 objects to banks, but it dont recognize [code]method OpenUpBank()[/code] any help? its completely clean. id need to add OpenUpBank and char saving for bank items.

item.title: [PI] how to add working method OpenUpBank()?
item.dc:creator: @mgl mgl
item.description:
@mgl wrote:

EDIT… I see: Look here.

c.clickObjectType = 0; //Bank boothes case 3045: case 2213: case 5276: case 6084: c.getPA().openUpBank(); break; // c.sendMessage("Object type: " + objectType); switch (objectType) {

Should be like this:

c.clickObjectType = 0; switch (objectType) { case 3045: case 2213: case 5276: case 6084: c.getPA().openUpBank(); break;

Your putting your cases before “switch (objectType) {” And you should be putting them after. I think that’s why your getting those errors.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how to add working method OpenUpBank()?

item.title: [PI] how to add working method OpenUpBank()?
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

/** * Open bank **/ public void openUpBank() { // synchronized(c) { if (c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) { c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream(); c.isBanking = true; } } thats what i have for openupbank() but its still not working? and in my ActionHandler.java where abouts would i place [code]public void firstClickObject(int objectType, int obX, int obY) {
c.clickObjectType = 0;
// c.sendMessage("Object type: " + objectType);
switch (objectType) {

	default:
		ScriptManager.callFunc("objectClick1_" + objectType, c, objectType,
				obX, obY);
		break;

	}
}

public void secondClickObject(int objectType, int obX, int obY) {
	c.clickObjectType = 0;
	// c.sendMessage("Object type: " + objectType);
	switch (objectType) {

	default:
		ScriptManager.callFunc("objectClick2_" + objectType, c, objectType,
				obX, obY);
		break;
	}
}[/code]

bank booth openbank? where would this position in the above code?

//Bank boothes case 3045: case 2213: case 5276: case 6084: c.getPA().openUpBank(); break;

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how to add working method OpenUpBank()?

item.title: [PI] how to add working method OpenUpBank()?

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“bowzer, post:1, topic:468712”]i’m currently working on a project. and bank booths wont even open up the bank interface.
iv added click1 and click2 objects to banks, but it dont recognize method OpenUpBank()
any help?
its completely clean. id need to add OpenUpBank and char saving for bank items.[/quote]

method OpenUpBank()
openBank(); // or whatever your Bank Method is named.

Or did you need the Method?
